abilities.description: When you gaze into the future and foresee details regarding the time after humanity's extinction, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.13b2d777c6fb719d]{Gather Information} +spirit and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit with a match, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.75d5b0762ebab856]{Make a Discovery}. On a miss, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ff32c523829d6481]{Endure Stress} (-3).

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.9f538fabf8998c5b]{Compel} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} (+iron) by foretelling humanity's doom, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you dwell upon doomsday events, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ff32c523829d6481]{Endure Stress} (-1). If you resist the stress and score a hit, take +2 momentum.
